titleStmt.title: A commentarie vpon the first and second chapters of Saint Paul to the Colossians Wherein, the text is cleerly opened, observations thence perspiciously deducted ... Together with diuers places of Scripture briefely explained. By Mr. Paul Bayne. B.D.
titleStmt.author: Baynes, Paul, d. 1617.

titleStmt.title: A commentarie vpon the first and second chapters of Saint Paul to the Colossians Wherein, the text is cleerly opened, observations thence perspiciously deducted ... Together with diuers places of Scripture briefely explained. By Mr. Paul Bayne. B.D.
titleStmt.author: Baynes, Paul, d. 1617.
Stubbs, Justinian, 1604 or 5-1681.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Richard Badger, for Nicholas Bourne, and are to be sold at his shop at the Royall Exchange,

notesStmt.note: "Lectures preached vpon these texts of Scripture" has separate divisional title, pagination and register. (Divisional title is actually leaf 2C2 of first section.).
Reproduction of the original in Cambridge University Library.
